[00:00.00]Why Would I Stop? (Explicit) - Big Sean
[00:02.93]Lyrics by：Rogét Chahayed/Sean Anderson/Chauncey Hollis
[00:05.87]Composed by：Rogét Chahayed/Sean Anderson/Chauncey Hollis
[00:08.81]Yeah woah
[00:12.63]This what they been waiting on
[00:16.37]Critical ain't no time left on the clock
[00:18.45]When it's your time give 'em something to watch
[00:20.14]I picked all the locks 'til I buy out the block
[00:22.23]And I know I'm a gift but I think out the box
[00:24.25]And they want me to stop
[00:25.38]But why would I stop
[00:27.01]Huh
[00:27.45]I am unstoppable
[00:28.76]Hold up why would I stop
[00:30.82]B***h why would I stop
[00:32.83]Chill
[00:33.88]Chill
[00:34.28]I don't jump I dive in it
[00:36.82]Hold up hold up hold up
[00:38.33]This the reason I'm alive ain't it
[00:40.83]This s**t the antidote this the cure cancer flow
[00:42.80]Stop a pandemic and the globe
[00:44.27]The product of old 'Ye chopping up the sample flow
[00:46.29]Dealer and Pimp C the triller
[00:47.72]This s**t might go too trill for Triller though
[00:49.32]Woah
[00:49.45]I see you critical
[00:50.48]I'm the hospitable
[00:51.31]Favorite rappers I donе cut they umbilicals
[00:53.13]Cut
[00:53.42]Red Wings jersеy B.I.G. look like Pac
[00:55.34]The blacker the berry more they wan' see it rot
[00:57.29]Rot
[00:57.46]I'm going down as one of the gods
[00:59.29]G-O-D D-O-A dead or alive
[01:01.23]I'm laying low they could be espionage
[01:03.32]This ain't no walk in the park you can't slide
[01:05.35]Solution to everyone one else 'round me problems
[01:07.26]Next episode got the whole f**king world watching
[01:09.20]I might leave the series come back like I'm Robin
[01:11.20]Getting that all right now my only two options
[01:13.25]So why would I stop
[01:15.35]I am unstoppable
[01:16.78]Hold up why would I stop
[01:18.85]B***h this s**t unstoppable
[01:20.90]Chill
[01:21.89]Chill
[01:22.33]I don't jump I dive in it
[01:24.83]Hold up hold up hold up
[01:26.32]This the reason I'm alive ain't it
[01:28.75]The DJ gon' drop this we made it from scratch
[01:30.69]I'm mindin' my business and all of it's black
[01:32.79]My dawg on the same way the mode is attack
[01:34.77]I don't complain about life I adapt
[01:36.88]I'm at the point if I f**k with a lil' ho
[01:38.66]It's not a just a fling it's a scam
[01:40.26]On God
[01:40.83]I can't be handin' out samples
[01:42.38]No way
[01:42.77]I can't be havin' ten baby mamas
[01:44.41]That s**t sound like a job not a family
[01:46.40]Straight up
[01:46.90]And I do this s**t for the family
[01:48.47]Straight up
[01:48.74]Yeah that's just the roost how I planned it
[01:50.39]On God
[01:50.78]D2 this s**t the new standard
[01:52.31]Grr
[01:53.81]Upgraded the city it got a new feeling the house that I built
[01:56.88]Woah woah woah
[01:57.87]House in the hills ain't no hills in the D so we all in the field
[02:00.95]Woah woah
[02:02.37]Running s**t five K three K Andre
[02:04.36]Run it run it run it
[02:05.83]Hero in my hood when they dress like me that's cosplay
[02:08.79]Give a f**k 'bout a threat n***a
[02:10.83]I'm a threat leaving out the driveway
[02:12.23]Swerve-swerve-swerve-swerve
[02:13.01]I never listen to what the odds say
[02:14.51]Why when the universe would ponder what I say
[02:16.37]I say I say I say I say I say I say I say I say
[02:20.46]I say I say I say I say I say I say I say I say
data.trans:
[ti:Why Would I Stop? (Explicit)]
[ar:Big Sean]
[al:Detroit 2 (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.93]//
[00:05.87]//
[00:08.81]//
[00:12.63]难道这就是他们等待一切
[00:16.37]对批评置之不理 抓紧最后的决胜时间
[00:18.45]这是属于你的时间 让他们见识一下你的实力
[00:20.14]我把整个街区收入囊中
[00:22.23]我知道我天资聪颖 可我想打破成规
[00:24.25]可他们想阻止我
[00:25.38]可我为什么要停下脚步
[00:27.01]//
[00:27.45]我势不可挡
[00:28.76]等等 我为什么要停下脚步
[00:30.82]碧池 我为什么要停下脚步
[00:32.83]放轻松
[00:33.88]放轻松
[00:34.28]我混得风生水起
[00:36.82]等等 等等 等等
[00:38.33]这是我热力四射的缘由 难道不是么
[00:40.83]我的歌就是解药 可以治愈这些不入流的flow
[00:42.80]阻止浩劫席卷全球
[00:44.27]就像把采样老歌玩得出神入化的Kanye West
[00:46.29]还有大名鼎鼎的J Dilla和Pimp C
[00:47.72]这些东西对于Triller平台上的歌手来说无力招架
[00:49.32]//
[00:49.45]我知道你吹毛求疵
[00:50.48]我热情友好
[00:51.31]深受大家喜爱的说唱歌手 他们都得感谢我的帮助
[00:53.13]切断
[00:53.42]我身穿底特律红翼队的球衣 看上去就像2 Pac
[00:55.34]人们想看见我麻烦缠身 一败涂地
[00:57.29]一败涂地
[00:57.46]我致力于成为业界最优秀的说唱歌手
[00:59.29]死后才能出名 我放手一搏
[01:01.23]我行事低调 他们可能是刺探秘密的间谍
[01:03.32]这又不是在公园散步 你无法打败我
[01:05.35]解决我身边的每个问题
[01:07.26]下一张专辑会赢得全世界的瞩目
[01:09.20]我可能会暂时离开 像Robin一样重磅回归
[01:11.20]现在就收入囊中 我仅有的两个选择
[01:13.25]所以我为什么要停下脚步
[01:15.35]我势不可挡
[01:16.78]等等 我为什么要停下脚步
[01:18.85]碧池 这一切势不可挡
[01:20.90]放轻松
[01:21.89]放轻松
[01:22.33]我混得风生水起
[01:24.83]等等 等等 等等
[01:26.32]这是我热力四射的缘由 难道不是么
[01:28.75]DJ给我来点音乐 我们制作出完美的音乐
[01:30.69]我用心经营事业 我的版图都是黑色
[01:32.79]我的兄弟蓄势待发 强势出击
[01:34.77]我不会抱怨生活 我努力适应
[01:36.88]我的心思全在事业上 如果我跟妹子纠缠不清
[01:38.66]这不是纵享欢愉 这是一场骗局
[01:40.26]讲真
[01:40.83]我不会四处留情
[01:42.38]没门
[01:42.77]我身边不会有一堆女人
[01:44.41]这听起来像是工作而不是家庭
[01:46.40]坦白直说
[01:46.90]我奋力拼搏是为了家人
[01:48.47]坦白直说
[01:48.74]这我订下宏伟蓝图的初衷
[01:50.39]讲真
[01:50.78]《Detroit 2》这张专辑是新标杆
[01:52.31]//
[01:53.81]开创新的面貌 带来新的感觉 都是由我亲手打造
[01:56.88]//
[01:57.87]山上的豪宅 底特律一马平川 所以我们都在旷野里
[02:00.95]//
[02:02.37]勇往直前 就像Andre 3000一样
[02:04.36]奋力奔跑
[02:05.83]我是人人膜拜的英雄 他们打扮得像我一样 这是角色扮演
[02:08.79]胆敢威胁我 哥们
[02:10.83]我是真正的威胁 赶紧滚开
[02:12.23]赶紧掉头
[02:13.01]我从不害怕困难
[02:14.51]想知道原因 全世界都在思索我说的话
[02:16.37]我娓娓道来
[02:20.46]我娓娓道来
